verses.name: Numbers 22:12
verses.text: And God said unto Balaam, Thou shalt not go with them; thou shalt not curse the people: for they are blessed.

verses.name: Numbers 22:13
verses.text: And Balaam rose up in the morning, and said unto the princes of Balak, Get you into your land: for the Lord refuseth to give me leave to go with you.

verses.name: Numbers 22:14
verses.text: And the princes of Moab rose up, and they went unto Balak, and said, Balaam refuseth to come with us.

verses.name: Numbers 22:15
verses.text: And Balak sent yet again princes, more, and more honourable than they.
